TextBody:
Hi Lucas,

The best option here would be to schedule a remote session with the customer and check connectivity and collect logs if we can't figure out why the clients are not connecting to the server.

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

TextBody:
Hi Lucas,

I asked my colleagues where I can find their server so I can take a look in the backend to see what's wrong.
We can schedule the remote session, but if the console is unavailable, we can't do anything.
As a side note, the agents do their job even if they can't connect to the server.
I will get back to you as soon as I have access to their server.

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

TextBody:
Hi Lucas,

Unfortunately I can't today, but I'm free tomorrow from 12:00 - 15:00 Brazil time.
In the meantime, could you check if the server's IP is set correctly on the clients?
I had a similar issue yesterday, and I believe the customer just installed the agent they were sent by email, without modifying the server's address.

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
